channel.title: How many games do you own?
channel.description: Over the years, how many video games have you bought? I have 40-50 games.

item.title: How many games do you own?
item.dc:creator: SwampFox
item.description:
About 120 NES games, 50 SNES Games, 20 Nintendo 64 Games, 8 GameCube Games. 90 Atari 2600 games, 7 Atari 5200 games, 4 Atari 7800 games, 15 Atari Jaguar Games, 8 Sega Master System Games, 40 Sega Genesis Games, 9 Sega CD Games, 4 Sega 32X Games, 18 Sega Saturn Games, 14 Sega DreamCast Games.

Probably around 200 PS1 Games, 300 PS2 Games, 17 PS3 Games. 0 Xbox Original Games, 90 Xbox 360 Games.

And (including steam, and my retail purchases) about 300 PC games

Read full topic
item.source: How many games do you own?

item.dc:creator: TheSuperNova
item.description:
gibbelin:

That makes me feel a lot better. Because I’ve owned cars that cost less than what it’s saying I’ve spent on games.

lol, I’ve got pretty much most of my games while on sale over steam, so the total cost doesn’t add up to anywhere near as much as the steam calculator says, that’s a relief

item.title: How many games do you own?
item.dc:creator: gibbelin
item.description:
Slowpokes Bro:

Edit I was looking at the Steam Calculator a little more closely and it doesn’t show when you got games on sale. I remember getting L4D2 on sale for 10 bucks, and Portal 2 for 44 bucks when I pre-ordered it. Just something I thought I’d mention.

That makes me feel a lot better. Because I’ve owned cars that cost less than what it’s saying I’ve spent on games.

Read full topic
